Serene Protection.name: Serene Protection
Serene Protection.flavor: Once you understand a thing, it becomes a simple matter to ignore it. Sharing your understanding with your allies, you ward yourself and them from harm.
Serene Protection.target: You and each ally in the burst
Serene Protection.effect: Choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, or thunder. Each target gains resist 30 to that damage type until the end of your next turn.
